name: The Other Side / 另一边
description:
“猫猫会变成液体。”这是一种常见的自然现象。它们柔软的如同墨滴一样的身体通常能够穿过狭窄的缝隙。它们出色的弹跳力能帮助他们越过沟壑。

当森林开始凋零，碎裂的时候，它们开始去往另一边。那里可能并没有另一片安静的树林，那里是另一个陌生的世界。

但是它们信奉的是——所到之处，就是自然。

"Kittens turn to liquid." This is a common natural phenomenon. Their soft, ink-drop-like bodies can often fit through narrow gaps, and their excellent bouncing power helps them to cross gullies. 

As the forest begins to wither and crumble, they start to go to the other side. There may not be another quiet wood there, it is another strange world.  

But they believe in it - where they go, there is nature.

玩家在丛林中需要学会跳跃（space）、蹬墙跳（连击space）、液化（Q）并从人类设置的陷阱中逃脱，然后去往the other side，那里有城市、废墟；机遇和挑战。

In the jungle the player needs to learn to jump (space), stomp on walls (combo space), liquefy (Q) and escape from the traps set by humans, then go to THE OTHER SIDE, where there are cities, ruins; opportunities and challenges.

游戏设计/ Game Design：财子 Caizi / 可一 Keyi
